column4: i just installed a new laptop battery and karmic seems to have trouble recognizing it. the power-manager says 'full', but when AC is unplugged the laptop shuts down  cold from lack of power, any insights?
did you allow the battery to charge? I am not even sure if that needs to be done but it would seem logical to me
that was my only guess, sorry can't help more.
stick around and ask from time to time in here, somebody will have an answer.
